title: Unable to connect to the login queue
body:
Region is selected (NA)
Server is up
Clock is set
I'm using IE 11 (so no Offline Mode)
I used /flushdns
I've allowed League through the Firewall
I've disabled the firewall, restarted my computer, and tried again
I've reinstalled League

I'm afraid I'm running out of ideas. Could it be something on your guys' end? What should my next steps be?

replies.body: The first time this happened to me, I tried everything on my end to fix it. Nothing worked. I waited an hour, and it worked just fine! The next time this happened to me, I didn't bother to do anything. I went away for 2 hours, came back, and it worked fine. I'm currently able to log in right now. Have you tried again recently?
I've tried off and on for about a week. Good idea, though!

This might have been some kind of hiccup in your connection so that it wasn't able to reach our servers or get a fast enough response for some reason. You've done a good amount of troubleshooting already, but let's make sure your ports are configured correctly as well as going through the other steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know if that helps!
